Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

Malice:
 
Malice dropped both his swords and charged head on toward the oncoming strike.  The minion's sword pierced the bounty hunter's side, but Malice knocked Nightstrike's hand off the sword to get him in a headlock, pulled tight, then swung the minion into the many rocks and trees in the area.  After a while of thrashing Nightstrike, Malice dropped him, pulled out the sword from his side, healed the wound, and raced back to get his swords.  He reclaimed them and went back to finish Nightstrike off.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
NightStrike::

Night strike dodged the shots and tried to strike Malice again with his sword


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
Malice:
  
Malice charged forward, parried the minion's strike and sliced his side with the katanna, then smacked him in the back with the flat side of Verte- Breaker.  He slowed and stopped, pulled his disruptor rifle, and fired a few shots into the back of the minion Night Strike.  He spotted an energon deposit, stuck the katanna tip into it, and in full view of the public, began absorbing the energy from the deposit.

		
---------------------------------
